title: Crybeto_Snake
author: Crybeto_Snake
content: Crybeto.win is a livestreaming gambling platform that takes full advantage of web 3.0 technology. CBO is the governance token of Crybeto.How does one accumulate CBO? 1. From betting on the Crybeto platform.2. From purchasing CBO on Pancakeswap.3. From referring users to the CBO platform.4. From betting with CBO that users have earned over time.What are the features of CBO?10 billion market capitalization hard cap.Increasing difficulty with token issuance. The more tokens are issues, the harder it is to accumulate more for the individual.Staking - on both Pancakeswap and the Crybeto platform.Regular BuyBack and token burn mechanisms.https://crybeto.winWhat makes Crybeto different from other online Crypto Casinos?1. No need to make deposits. Simply authorize your Metamask wallet to withdraw and deposit BEP20 USDT. If you would like to test the safety of the platform, we advise you to create a new Metamask wallet on a new browser.2. Live streaming Beautiful dealers. Meet female dealers from Asia, Latin-America, and Europe.3. All bets are settled on-chain. Presently every bet placed and bet won is visible on BSC Scan and the binance blockchain in general.If you are interested, you are welcome to sign up, bind your wallet (this will cost a small one-time payment in BNB), and play a few games of Baccarat using demo money (not real money).Support for more blockchains and more cryptocurrencies will come with time.Recent publications: https://www.bsc.news/post/crybeto-the-worlds-first-decentralized-casino-launching-with-3-freebiesIf anyone has any legitimate marketing opportunities, you are welcome to email us at partnerships@crybeto.win or message us on telegram (can be found on our official website).
